sisun pas denage ghathana sambandhayen athadanguwe pasuwana wishesha karya balakaye 13 denage apa ayaduma wenuwen karunu dakwimata thrikunamalaya mahadhikarana winisuru aar. ee. ranaraja mahatha labana sapthambar 17 data sidukarana lesa dina niyama kerini.2006 janawari 02 dina thrikunamala muhudu werale gandhi piliruwa asala di sisun pas denaku ghathanaya kirime chodanawata sakapita athadanguwe pasuwana wishesha karya balakaye 13 dena sandaha apa ayadumpath idiripath kala nithignyawarun wana dhanushka madagedara ha mejar ajith prasanna yana mahathwaru ee sandaha karunu dakwimata dinayak laba dena lesa kala illimak anuwa mahadhikarana winisuru mema dinaya laba di thibuni.me nadu wibhagaya danata thrikunamala mahesthrath adhikaranaye sidukarana athara chodana 15k sambandhayen sakshikaruwan 36 denakugen yali sakshi wimasima siduwe..

jana­tha­wage chanda­yen rate usasma nila­yata path wi, bala­yata pami­ni­mata apeksha karana gota­baya, thama mangala raliyedi mewani ani­thika poro­ndu­wak dimen rate nithi­ga­ruka pura­wa­si­yan kampa kiri­mata samath wi athi athara, ee praka­shaya rate ana­ga­thaya anduru aaga­dha­ya­kata ada­gena yana bawata paha­dili, bhaya­naka ana­thuru anga­wi­maki.
ee wagema garbhani bhawayata path wena ekath ee daruwa masa 10k kuse thiyagena me loketa bihi karana ekath lehesi pahasu katayuththak neweyi.

18 wani sanshodhanaya genalla rata palanaya thamange budalayak karagannawa kiyalayi yu am pi karayo ka gahanna thiya gaththe.mekanam wishala karadarayak kiyala thamayi mamath ape pawulata kiwwe.habayi ape pawula kiwwe wishala karadare ooka neweyi eha waththe un ape paththata karala wata gahana eka kiyala.rate mayimanam hoyanna yanawa waththe mayima danne na kiyala thawa dosmurayakuth damapi.mama ithin hithin hithagaththa ape wata ithuruwennath rata ithuruwela thiyenna epaya kiyala.
wishwaya sada athi sama muladrawyakma unu karanu labayi jwalitha unusuma (2pethrus 3:12).

adatath abhirahasakwa athi mema karune thawath deyak wanne ihatha ki thripada mewalama matha thibu pettiye mema rahasa sangawa thibennata athi bawayi.
apa agaya karana de thama, putha pasal arunu wita yanne, apage wagema yahapath pawul parisarayakata.
buddhagama ekka ape lankeyanta wune me tika.
